alert-bar.text: ü§ì Visit the store and receive our products directly at your home.

promo-banner.text: Visit our store and receive our products directly at your home!

where-to-find-us.title: Our
where-to-find-us.description: Visit us at our two restaurants located in Santiago. Try our curated menu of Japanese tapas and ramen, emphasizing the quality of our ingredients and preparation techniques.

testimonials.title: They tell it
testimonials.review-button-label: Let us know your opinion on Google

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: Selection of partners that usually offer our products, the availability or variety of products may vary in each case.

hero.title: Ramen
hero.old-main-text: We use traditional, fine dining and fermentation techniques to fuse contemporary Japanese ramen with the flavors and ingredients of the Latin American cuisine.
hero.main-text: We use traditional techniques from fine dining and the world of fermentation to fuse contemporary Japanese ramen with the flavors and ingredients of the South American cuisine.
hero.secondary-text: We are an experimental ramen bar, we are a factory of fermented products, we are a team that isn't afraid to explore, make mistakes, or try out new things; we are: Mirai Food Lab.

projects.title: Ramen Bar üçú
projects.old-description: Reduced menu of Japanese tapas and ramen, with a focus on the quality of ingredients and preparation techniques.
projects.description: A curated menu of Japanese tapas and ramen, emphasizing the quality of our ingredients and preparation techniques.

projects.title: Products üì¶
projects.old-description: High-quality products such as kombuchas, misos, koji, and more are made using traditional and modern fermentation techniques.
projects.description: Traditional and modern fermentation techniques in high-quality products: kombuchas, misos, koji, and more.

projects.title: Pop-ups üëØ
projects.old-description: Working in collaboration with other restaurants to expand our proposal to new spaces, experiment, and learn from others.
projects.description: Collaborating with other restaurants to bring our concept to new spaces, explore novel ideas, and grow through shared experiences.

shop-categories.main-description: Discover our selection of artisanal products, from fermented kombuchas to exclusive merch. Shipping throughout Chile.

kombuchas.title: Kombuchas
kombuchas.description: Naturally fermented beverages with unique flavors. Live probiotics for your wellness.

de-la-casa.title: House Made
de-la-casa.description: Artisanal products made in our lab: misos, kojis, sauces and more.

merch.title: Merch
merch.description: Exclusive Mirai t-shirts, hats and accessories. Take our style with you.

collaborations.title: Our
collaborations.description: Collaborating with other restaurants to bring our concept to new spaces, explore novel ideas, and grow through shared experiences.

items.title: mirai + yum cha
items.description: Pop-up with two editions: December 11 at Yum Cha's and December 12 at Mirai's. We adapted the proposal to each identity: at yum cha, a 10-course menu with all the fine dining; at mirai, a more informal concept with dishes to share.

items.title: Izakaya Night
items.description: A special night transforming our space into an authentic Japanese izakaya, with tapas, sake and a unique atmosphere.

items.title: Mareal x Mirai - Santiago
items.description: Collaboration with Mareal bringing the flavors of the sea to our Japanese cuisine in Santiago.

items.title: Mareal x Mirai - Pichilemu
items.description: We brought our proposal to the coast, merging seafood products with our Japanese cuisine.

items.title: UMAMI - Mirai & Yum Cha
items.description: Celebration of umami in collaboration with Yum Cha, exploring the fifth taste in every dish.

items.title: UMAMI - Yum Cha & Mirai
items.description: Second edition of our UMAMI collaboration, this time at Yum Cha's space.

items.title: 7-Course Dinner
items.description: Gastronomic tasting experience with a 7-course menu showcasing our best techniques.

items.title: Tasting Dinners
items.description: Series of tasting dinners exploring different techniques and flavors.

items.title: 7 courses + pairing
items.description: Complete 7-course experience paired with selected beverages.
